tool.name: LAMMPS Simulation
tool.command: ln -s $force_field $force_field_fn && ln -s $struct_data $struct_data_fn && lmp -in $input && mv $dump_fn $dump && mv log.lammps $log

param.name: force_field_fn
param.label: force field filename in input script

param.name: struct_data_fn
param.label: starting structure filename in input script

param.name: dump_fn
param.label: output dump filename in input script (default: dump.2)

tool.help:
Simulates molecular dynamics trajectory using LAMMPS program.
To use the MD trajectory for subsequent INS simulations, the following format is required (where A B C are the element symbols):
dump 1 all custom 1 lammps.dump id element x y z
dump_modify 1 element A B C
